text: {| class="wikitable floatright" style="font-size: 0.9em; width: 270px;" |+ Minor planets discovered: 56 |- | see |} Graham E. Bell is an American amateur astronomer and prolific discoverer of minor planets. Along with amateur astronomer Gary Hug, he operates the U.S. Farpoint Observatory in Eskridge, Kansas. He is credited by the Minor Planet Center with the discovery of 56 numbered minor planets between 1998 and 2000. He also co-discovered 178P/Hug- Bell, a periodic comet. == List of discovered minor planets == {| class="wikitable" 89%; 1.65em !important; |- | 18055 Fernhildebrandt || 11 October 1999|| |- | 19619 Bethbell || 16 August 1999|| |- | 19630 Janebell || 2 September 1999|| |- | 20673 Janelle || 3 November 1999|| |- | 21651 Mission Valley || 19 July 1999|| |- | 22791 Twarog || 14 June 1999|| |- | || 2 September 1999|| |- | 23989 Farpoint || 3 September 1999|| |- | 24265 Banthonytwarog || 13 December 1999|| |- | 24305 Darrellparnell || 26 December 1999|| |- | 24308 Cowenco || 29 December 1999|| |- | 25594 Kessler || 29 December 1999|| |- | || 29 December 1999|| |- | || 28 December 1999|| |- | || 24 August 1999|| |- | || 27 December 1999|| |- | || 17 June 1999|| |- | || 6 September 1999|| |- | || 6 September 1999|| |- | || 12 November 1999|| |} {| class="wikitable" 89%; 1.65em !important; |- | || 6 October 1999|| |- | || 14 November 1999|| |- | || 13 December 1999|| |- | || 28 December 1999|| |- | || 31 December 1999|| |- | || 13 November 1998|| |- | || 11 November 1999|| |- | || 28 December 1999|| |- | || 28 December 1999|| |- | || 22 August 1999|| |- | || 7 September 1999|| |- | || 6 December 1999|| |- | || 20 August 1999|| |- | || 29 October 1999|| |- | || 11 November 1999|| |- | || 12 November 1999|| |- | || 27 December 1999|| |- | || 13 February 1999|| |- | || 13 September 1999|| |- | || 10 November 1999|| |} {| class="wikitable" 89%; 1.65em !important; |- | || 14 February 1999|| |- | || 5 October 1999|| |- | || 6 October 1999|| |- | || 15 November 1999|| |- | || 17 February 1999|| |- | || 5 July 1999|| |- | || 31 December 1999|| |- | || 31 December 1999|| |- | || 16 January 2000|| |- | || 9 September 1999|| |- | || 13 September 1999|| |- | || 13 February 1999|| |- | || 13 September 1999|| |- | || 10 December 1999|| |- | || 13 November 1999|| |- | || 6 November 1999|| |- !
